title: Vedanta Nico signs pact for supplying nickel to US-based AEsir Technologies
description: Vedanta Nico signed an agreement with AEsir Technologies to supply nickel for next-gen batteries. The partnership aims to develop nickel-zinc batteries, enhancing EV chargers, 5G telecom, and infrastructure. This move is expected to support the growing demand for EVs and sustainable technology.
